fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Engulf a player each night, disabling one of their abilities at random. If the disabled ability was the one they tried to use, you will be notified and gain Basic Defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every non-Biohazard ability that targets you has a 35% chance to fail. If it fails, you will be notified and gain Basic Defense. If the ability that fails has limited uses, it will still lose a use.
- Poison and Plague Immunity
